product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite Semi Form Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: For those with a larger build or who simply want a bit more room in their jersey, the men's Pearl Izumi Elite Semi Form Bike Jersey is relaxed and keeps you cool with Ice-fil technology.
